content: witchy halloween scrunchy thank you for your interest in my pattern this pattern has not been tested so if you find typographical or numerical errors please inform me so i can correct it i can be contacted via facebook or instagram happy hooking finished size legs are about 3 long scrunchy is about 4 wide materials worsted weight #4 yarn under 50 yards total o in black white green 3 5mm hook hair tie small amount of red felt needle hot glue scissors gauge not necessary but your finished size may vary stitches us terms slip_stitch -slip_stitch single_crochet -single_crochet skip -skip double_crochet -double_crochet st -stitch blo -back loop only chain -chain pattern notes this is a no sew pattern this pattern is constructed in 3 parts two legs and the scrunchy this pattern is worked in joined rounds # single_crochet means one single_crochet in each stitch for # stitches chains do not count as a stitch designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items leg make 2 alternating colors every round round 1 with white in magic_ring 6sc slip_stitch to join 2 with black chain 1 in blo 6 single_crochet slip_stitch to join 3 with white chain 1 in blo 6 single_crochet slip_stitch to join 4 with black chain 1 in blo 6 single_crochet slip_stitch to join 5 with white chain 1 in blo 6 single_crochet slip_stitch to join 6 with black chain 1 in blo 6 single_crochet slip_stitch to join 7 with white chain 1 in blo 6 single_crochet slip_stitch to join fasten_off white 8 with black chain 1 in blo 6 single_crochet slip_stitch to join 9 chain 1 flatten tip of leg 3 single_crochet across fasten_off weave in ends scrunchy the first round is crocheted around a hair tie round 1 with black chain 1 36 single_crochet slip_stitch to join chain 3 does not count as a stitch 2 *3dc in the same stich* 15 times hold up first leg to scrunchy and working through both layers double_crochet in each of the next 3 stitches hold up second leg and through both layers double_crochet in each of the next 3 stitches *3dc in the same stitch* 15 times slip_stitch to join fasten_off black 3 with green chain 1 *single_crochet chain 3 skip 2 sts* around fasten_off weave in ends designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items boots you can cut your boots free hand or you can use my template below to get the correct size first line up a credit card/gift card to match the size of the black box then trace the boot from the blue line on your felt cut out along the blue line fold the piece along the green line then place around your leg and add hot glue along the red line to secure boot closed and on your witch s leg reference photos enjoy your new witchy halloween scrunchy if you would like to support my designs you can buy me a coffee on
